price: njëkohësisht (të kemi çuar) si thirrës, që i fton njerëzit në rrugën e Allahut me urdhrin e Tij dhe si pishtar ndriçues.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
